Sched::ActivateAccessCallback

Sched::ActivateAccessCallback Class Reference

Callback to manage synchronization between data flow execution and communication (set the Access to ready when the GlobalData is received). More...

Detailed Description

Callback to manage synchronization between data flow execution and communication (set the Access to ready when the GlobalData is received).
